import React, { Component } from 'react' import LayoutDashboard from '../../components/LayoutDashboard' import Link from 'next/link'; import axios from 'axios' import ListDataTable from '../../components/ListDataTable' class Post extends Component { state = { posts: [] } getPostAPI = () => { axios.get('http://localhost:3004/jsonusers/').then(response => { this.setState({posts: response.data}); console.log(response); }); } handleDelete = (data) => { axios.delete(`http://localhost:3004/jsonusers/${data}`) .then(res => { console.log(res); console.log(res.data); }) .catch(error => { console.log(error); }); } componentDidMount () {axios.get('http://localhost:3004/jsonusers').then(response => { this.setState({posts: response.data}); console.log(response); }); } render() { const posts = this.state.posts.map(post => { return }); return ( {/* Main Content */}
